review: Upgraded from a ROKU and extremely satisfied with Amazon Fire TV!  We used ROKU only to run the Amazon Prime app and experienced FREQUENT streaming and connection issues (over WIFI).  Amazon Fire TV has a great UI, is extremely fast and we have yet to experience any streaming issues (Full HD over WIFI).  Great job Amazon!
author: Stephen G

review: The remote alone is great enough to sell this product as a viable option. The remote is great. My only issue, which holds true across all Amazon products, is that the user interface is very limited. I feel restricted using it. That being said it is way better than a Roku, but I can't speak to other media streaming devices like apple tv.
